content: the two edges are touching sew a total of 8 stitches together - 4 on each side place the muzzle right under the eyes - it should cover round 12 to round 25 the increased side of the muzzle should be the one closer to the eyes 7 the nostrils should cover round 4 to round 8 of the muzzle approximately 10 stitches apart place each ear on round 9 of the head approximately 6 stitches away from each eye 8 the legs should cover round 7 to round 15 of the body approximately 9 stitches apart the arms should cover round 18 to 26 of the body approximately 5 stitches apart attach the head to the body please do not distribute sell print otherwise give away or claim as yours any part of this pattern pictures included you may sell finished products using this pattern however i ask that you credit ambroscrochet 9
